# touchedInput

**Instance Property**

The input object that provides the touch state of the element.

## Declaration

```swift
var touchedInput: (any GCTouchedStateInput)? { get }
```

## Getting input state

- **pressedInput**: The input object that provides the linear and press state of the element.
